metadata.title: CVE-2013-7436 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: noVNC before 0.5 does not set the secure flag for a cookie in an httpssession, which makes it easier for remote attackers to capture this cookieby intercepting its transmission within an http session.

criterions.comment: novnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
